title.rendered: Five common depressed thoughts, and what to do about them

@graph.headline: Five common depressed thoughts, and what to do about them

@graph.name: 'I'm a Burden' and Other Common Depressed Thoughts
@graph.description: Here are some common depressed thoughts men with depression have, and what you can do about them; the first step is recognizing them.

itemListElement.name: Five common depressed thoughts, and what to do about them

@graph.name: Joshua Beharry
@graph.description: Since recovering from experiences with depression and attempted suicide in 2010, Josh has become a passionate advocate for mental health, volunteering and working in the area of mental health advocacy since 2012. Josh has been with HeadsUpGuys since 2014. Josh has had articles published by HuffPost, the National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI), and the Anxiety and Depression Association of America (ADAA). He has also been interviewed by HuffPost, Global TV, Movember Radio, and has had his story and work featured by CBC News: The National. Additionally, Josh has written over 50 articles on HeadsUpGuys, which have been visited more than 500,000 times.
